role.title: Product Manager
role.summary: Own the roadmap for NovaSoft's core B2B collaboration platform.
role.description:
We are looking for a Product Manager to take ownership of our B2B collaboration suite. You will define product strategy, prioritize the backlog, and work cross-functionally with engineering, design, and customer success to ship features that delight our 500+ enterprise customers.

Key responsibilities:
- Define and communicate product vision and quarterly roadmap
- Conduct customer discovery interviews and analyze usage data
- Write clear product specs and acceptance criteria
- Collaborate closely with engineering and design through the full product lifecycle
- Track KPIs and iterate based on data-driven insights

organization.name: NovaSoft
organization.description: NovaSoft builds intelligent collaboration tools for distributed enterprise teams. Our platform is used by 500+ companies across 30 countries.

experience.description: 3+ years in a product management role at a B2B SaaS company.

other: Background in collaboration or productivity tools

equity.details: Employee stock option plan with 1-year cliff.

remote_policy.travel_requirement: Quarterly team offsite in Amsterdam (3–4 days), travel expenses fully covered.

benefits.description: 28 days paid vacation plus local public holidays.
EUR 1,500 home office setup budget plus MacBook Pro.
EUR 1,500 annual learning budget for courses, books, and conferences.
16 weeks fully paid parental leave for all parents.

growth.career_path: Product Manager → Senior Product Manager → Group PM → Director of Product. You will have a clear growth framework with bi-annual reviews.

stages.name: Application Review
stages.description: Review of CV and portfolio. Response within 7 business days.

stages.name: Recruiter Screen
stages.description: Brief call to discuss the role, your experience, and logistics.

stages.name: Product Case Study
stages.description: Take-home product case (2 hours max). You will present and discuss your approach in a 90-minute session.

stages.name: Cross-Functional Interview
stages.description: Meet with an engineering lead and a designer to discuss collaboration style.

stages.name: Founder Chat
stages.description: Informal conversation with a co-founder about vision and culture fit.

stages.name: Offer
stages.description: Offer call followed by written contract.

culture.work_style: We are a remote-first company that values async communication and deep work. We have two no-meeting days per week and document decisions in writing. Teams operate with high autonomy and clear accountability.
culture.dei_statement: NovaSoft is committed to building a diverse team. We welcome applications regardless of background and provide equal opportunities in hiring, promotion, and compensation.
